text: Saw the ad on TV for a $5.99,  2 item large, carryout, so I bit. Just plain awful. The crust was like it was made the day before, allowing the surface to dry out and become stale. No flavor, no chewy inner-crust, worse than cardboard. At ‚Ä¶More

text: Took the kids there for lunch Buffet. There was always hot pizza ready. And a simple salad bar. Had a two year old with us so it's nice to have the option of peaches. Hostess was pleasant and waitress did a great job. Place tends to be busy for lunch. Food very tasty.

text: Decent service and excellent quality! The ambiance is definitely dated though.

text: I'd give it zero stars if i could. We ordered 5 pizza's and 2 salads at 5 minutes to 11am. they said 30 minutes. it's now been an hour and 40 minutes and they are not even picking up the phone. horrible and will never use the solon pizza hut again. won't even dine in either.

text: Hit or miss when it comes to staff. Sometimes they are friendly other times they make it very clear how terrible their day is going. I've had a few online orders wrong, but I do understand the food service world and they get a high volume of customers so no big deal. Food has been good overall.

text: Manager is rude to customers and has very little patience. Plates and tables were dirty. Don't waste your time and money on this unsanitary and disgusting restaurant.

text:

text: This has to be thee worst pizza and wings I've ever had! The wing sauce was literally splashed on top of some breaded wings that were dry as F***. The pizza sauce was bad, smelled like it had sat out for days and tasted stail! I even got a cold sore burn on my lip from the high acidity in the sauce. Totally disgusting!

text: Decent pizza for a decent price.  The customer service has never overwhelmed me at how awesome it could be.  Every once in a while, someone will be a gem, but this place seems like a revolving door.  I never see the same person working there twice in a row.
